alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hand; Hughes; Hyde; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 22 at 12:44PM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Sully, Hughes, Hyde, Hand and Buffalo Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills from 20 below to 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
